name: es6-boilerplate
description: Boilerplate for a transpiled ES2016 library

scripts.build: npm run build-src && npm run build-test
scripts.test: npm run build && mocha -R spec --bail test
scripts.coverage: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/mocha -- --ui bdd --recursive -R spec

author: Adam Brady <adam@boxxen.org>
